english.segment1: I got a lot to say to you. Yeah, I got a lot to say. I noticed your eyes are always glued to me. Keeping them here. And it makes no sense at all
english.segment2: They taped over your mouth. Scribbled out the truth with their lies. You little spies
english.segment3: They taped over your mouth. Scribbled out the truth with their lies. You little spies
english.segment4: Crush, crush, crush. Crush, crush. (Two, three, four)
english.segment5: Nothing compares to. A quiet evening alone. Just the one, two. I was just counting on
english.segment6: That never happens. I guess I'm dreaming again. Let's be more than this
english.segment7: If you want to play it like a game. Well, come on, come on, let's play. 'Cause I'd rather waste my life pretending. Than have to forget you for one whole minute
english.segment8: They taped over your mouth. Scribbled out the truth with their lies. You little spies
english.segment9: They taped over your mouth. Scribbled out the truth with their lies. You little spies
english.segment10: Crush, crush, crush. Crush, crush. (Two, three, four)
english.segment11: Nothing compares to. A quiet evening alone. Just the one, two. I was just counting on
english.segment12: That never happens. I guess I'm dreaming again. Let's be more than this now
english.segment13: Rock and roll, baby. Don't you know. That we're all alone now?. I need something to sing about
english.segment14: Rock and roll, hey. Don't you know, baby. We're all alone now?. I need something to sing about
english.segment15: Rock and roll, hey. Don't you know, baby. We're all alone now?. Give me something to sing about
english.segment16: Nothing compares to. A quiet evening alone. Just the one, two. I was just counting on
english.segment17: That never happens. I guess I'm dreaming again. Let's be more than. No ohh
english.segment18: Nothing compares to. A quiet evening alone. Just the one, two. I was just counting on
english.segment19: That never happens. I guess I'm dreaming again. Let's be more than. More than this
